field.label: Listening interfaces
field.help: Select all the interfaces to enable NetFlow on.

field.label: WAN interfaces
field.help: Select interfaces used for WAN traffic to avoid counting NAT traffic twice.

field.help: Select destinations to send NetFlow data to (ip address:port, eg 192.168.0.1:2550).

field.label: Active Timeout
field.help: Split long running flows into smaller parts.
